item.title: [Python] Introducing Bitcoin Systre on the weekend
item.description: #Background If you were surfing the internet, you found a very helpful site about Systre -Even in the literature! How to start Bitcoin BOT automatic trading -It was explained very clearly -I feel like I can do it even if I have no experience with Systre Because I was interested, I decided to write the code on the weekend and check the feeling -GithubThisisthecodeIwrotethistime.(notebookformat) By the way, I tried Cryptocurrency prediction with LSTM and it didn’t work very well.
